bioghist.p: Edgar Leroy Potts (1893-1970) received a degree in English from the University of Pennsylvania in 1932.

scopecontent.p: The collection consists of two drafts in typescript of Potts' thesis, "The History of the Philadelphia Theatre, 1890-1900," and a daily listing of plays performed in Philadelphia in 1890.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

relatedmaterial.p: Related material may be found in the following collections: University of Pennsylvania, Rare Book and Manuscript Library: Edgar Potts scrapbooks (Folio PN2256 .P6) and Edgar Potts clippings of theatrical biographies (Folio PN2285 .P6 ).
